titles.title: To exclude foreign reparation payments from consideration as income in determining eligibility and benefits under Federal housing assistance programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 2/25/1993--Introduced. Excludes foreign reparation payments from consideration as income in determining eligibility and benefits under specified Federal housing programs.
